dc:title: On Pilgrimage - September 1979
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: A set of short entries from her diary, including descriptions of anti-nuclear demonstrations and the subsequent arrests of participants, the death of several friends, politics on Cuba, and a book on Catholic Worker conscientious objectors in World War II. Mentions many friends and books.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 600 1979-09-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
